thread.title: BNY Mellon Races to Fix Pricing Glitches Before Markets Open Monday
thread.title_full: BNY Mellon Races to Fix Pricing Glitches Before Markets Open Monday - WSJ

author: Kirsten Grind
title: BNY Mellon Races to Fix Pricing Glitches Before Markets Open Monday
text:
Executives at Bank of New York Mellon Corp. are racing against the clock to make it through a backlog of pricing issues before the markets open Monday morning.
More than 100 executives at the bank worked through the weekend to correct a software glitch that has complicated pricing for hundreds of mutual funds and exchange-traded funds since last Monday. The problem stemmed from a SunGard system used by BNY Mellon that became... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
